pages.title: Charred Tree
pages.text: It is known that most wood tends to burn away to nothing, especially when struck by lighting, but certain types of hardy trees survive almost entirely intact, apart from their leaves.$(br2)You may find the remains of these charred trees throughout the world.

pages.title: A charred tree
pages.text: $(l:blocks/charred_wood)Charred wood blocks$() can be used for decoration.
